mapper.select: select if(max(replyProdReview_no) is not null, (select max(replyProdReview_no) from goot6.ReplyProdReviews) + 1, 1) from goot6.ReplyProdReviews
select max(replyProdReview_refOrder) + 1 from goot6.ReplyProdReviews where replyProdReview_ref = #{replyProdReview_ref}
mapper.insert: insert into goot6.ReplyProdReviews(replyProdReview_no, prodReview_no, member_id, replyProdReview_content, replyProdReview_refOrder, replyProdReview_ref) values (#{replyProdReview_no}, #{prodReview_no}, #{member_id}, #{replyProdReview_content}, #{replyProdReview_refOrder}, #{replyProdReview_ref})
mapper.select: select * from ReplyProdReviews where prodReview_no = #{prodReview_no} order by replyProdReview_ref asc, replyProdReview_refOrder asc
mapper.update: update goot6.ReplyProdReviews set replyProdReview_isDelete = 'Y' where replyProdReview_no = #{replyProdReview_no}
mapper.select: select replyProdReview_content from goot6.ReplyProdReviews where replyProdReview_no = #{replyProdReview_no}
mapper.update: update goot6.ReplyProdReviews set replyProdReview_content = #{replyProdReview_content} where replyProdReview_no = #{replyProdReview_no}
